X, Grip and Trigger
the Touchpad, Grip and Trigger
the Menu Button, Grip and Trigger
This binding can be changed within SteamVR input settings.

You can also toggle tracker freeze while in VR! 
Press {0} on your left controller.
Reinstall SteamVR manifests
Re-register SteamVR driver entry

Amethyst vr manifest couldn't be installed.
Is it even somewhere around here...?

Amethyst vr manifest couldn't be installed.
Please check SteamVR logs and consider reporting it.
B, Grip and Trigger
A, Grip and Trigger
the Touchpad, Grip and Trigger
the Menu Button, Grip and Trigger
This binding can be changed within SteamVR input settings.

You can also toggle skeleton flip while in VR! 
Press {0} on your right controller.

COULD NOT CHECK STATUS (ᗜˬᗜ)
E_WTF
Something's fucked a really big time.

Success! (Code {0})
I_OK
Everything's good!

OPENVR INIT ERROR (Code {0})
E_OVRINIT_ERROR
Check if SteamVR is running, and your VR headset is connected properly to it, and click 'Refresh' to check again. Additionally, you can restart SteamVR and check its logs.
messages.translatorComment: [Refresh] as in the refresh button, /DevicesPage/Buttons/Reconnect @Amethyst, make sure it's the same string!

messages.translation:
OPENVR ELEVATED (Code {0})
E_VRSERVER_RUNAS
Amethyst can't communicate with the OpenVR API if SteamVR is running with administrator privileges, please start it normally. Optionally, you can run Amethyst as administrator too, to suppress this specific error.

AMETHYST ELEVATED (Code {0})
E_AMETHYST_RUNAS
Amethyst is running with admin rights, please start it normally. Amethyst can't communicate with the OpenVR API whenever running with administrator privileges.

OPENVR ACTIONS ERROR (Code {0})
E_IVRINPUT_ERROR
Check if SteamVR is working properly, and your VR controllers are present in it. Additionally, you can restart SteamVR and check its logs.

SERVER CONNECTION ERROR (Code {0})
E_CONNECTION_ERROR
Check SteamVR add-ons (NOT overlays) and enable Amethyst. You can also try re-registering the driver entry from SteamVR service settings within Amethyst.

RPC CHANNEL FAILURE (Code {0})
E_RPC_CHAN_FAILURE
Could not connect to the the RPC channel because it was null. Please restart, check logs and write to us on Discord.

FATAL SERVER FAILURE (Code {0})
E_FATAL_SERVER_FAILURE
Please restart, check logs and write to us on Discord.

already exist, remove them now?

A copy of the K2EX SteamVR driver was found.
It is incompatible with Amethyst and needs to be removed.
Do it now?
Remove

a fatal exception occurred.

Amethyst won't be able to kill the SteamVR process
because it's running with administrator privileges.

You're good to go!

to register properly, kill it now?
Kill

openvrpaths write error.
